DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a fungal infection was active.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An infection caused by eukaryotic heterotrophic organisms that live as saprobes or parasites, including mushrooms, yeasts, smuts, molds, etc. They reproduce either sexually or asexually, and have life cycles that range from simple to complex. Filamentous fungi refer to those that grow as multicellular colonies (mushrooms and molds)._Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infection caused by eukaryotic heterotrophic organisms that live as saprobes or parasites, including mushrooms, yeasts, smuts, molds, etc. They reproduce either sexually or asexually, and have life cycles that range from simple to complex. Filamentous fungi refer to those that grow as multicellular colonies (mushrooms and molds).

Concepts.definition: An infection caused by a fungus.
Exerting influence or producing an effect.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.
